title: A Rioter told me that "being critical of your teammates" is against the rules
body: I was two week banned. And was told that being critical of my teammates performance (albeit absolutely no flame) is against the rules. Has Riot games been overtaken by some leftist SJWs? Apparently so. I've never seen a game with such a low bar for inappropriate behavior than league of legends in 2018. I've played this game for nearly 7 years and have not received a single ban until now. Completely unjustified. Sad company
